text:
If you movee any filter tag from the beginning to the end in the we.xml file,
a parser exception is thrown
creator: zavadsky@bigfoot.com
craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
The element order in a web.xml file is required by the DTD for web application 
deployment descriptors, as documented in the Servlet Specification.  Some 
servlet containers do not validate the element order, but applications that rely 
on this are *not* portable.
